ygData.subject: FW: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like a winning case to me.......hehehehehehehehehe From: Steven Cobb  Lemme get this straight, someone was sending him email
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like a winning case to me.......hehehehehehehehehe

From: Steven Cobb <cobb@...>

Lemme get this straight, someone was sending him email that he didn't want
(spam?)
and in an effort to stop it told the guy that he would charge him a fee for
reading
his email. THEN doesn't read the email that was sent to him and is planning
on going
to small claims court to get the fee? THEN he spams us about it like we
cared?

I agree with the others on the list, Nick is silly indeed. Amazes me how
people
refuse to use something as simple as a killist and think this method would
be a
better solution.

> Nick wrote:
>
> Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my lawyers request
I had
> warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee would be exempted
to his
> university/his parents. He sent me an email this morning that was lengthy
and I
> didn't even bother reading it. Again (to the people of the list), do not
send me
> private emails. Mr. Clark is going to have to go to small claims court
because of
> his actions.
